title: (x) FLAVOR masthead - Fashion Compressed, uncompressed {Mark S}
content: If this is a magazine logo it's probably been customized or hand-drawn, and maybe pre-digital. Resembles [Didot](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224323/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bagraphics/italian-didot/normal/testdrive.html?s=FLAVOR&p=72) but the A and R are different.
author: pattyfab

comments.content: It appears to be [Fashion Compressed](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224323/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/fashion-compressed/compressed/testdrive.html?s=FLAVOR&p=72), uncompressed a bit.
